Package com.camerontec.catalys.core.marketstate

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMarketInfo
    Market related information.
    IMarketMirror
    A "market mirror" processes messages to and from a market and uses them to construct the state of the market, consisting of orders and associated fills.
    IMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive
    An IMarketMirror with archive functionality.
    IMirrorOrderUpdater
    Interface for mirror order updater that updates/removes order amendable/removable tags.
    IMirrorRecoveryLogPersister
    Interface to persist and recover the contents of an IMarketMirror.
    IMirrorRecoveryLogSelector
    Interface that allows a IMirrorRecoveryLogPersister to performing operations on selected messages.
    IMirrorTagValuesFactory
    Interface for factories of mirror ITagValues that wraps TagValues so that we can intercept the setValue method in order to keep MarketMirror indices up to date.
    IOrderArchive
    Interface used by IMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive to provide order archiving capabilities.
    IRequestHistory
    Used to track the history of operations on a market entity.
    IRequestHistoryEntry
    A request and its current status.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultMirrorOrderUpdater
    Default IMirrorOrderUpdater implementation.
    DefaultMirrorTagValuesFactory  
    FixMarketMirror
    Implementation of IMarketMirror which maintains the state of a market by processing FIX messages to and from that market.
    FixMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive
    Default implementation of IMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive with pluggable archive.
    MarketMirrorCommandLineProcessor  
    MarketMirrorPurger
    Responsible for purging closed records from the market mirror and the recovery log.
    MirrorRecoveryLogPersisterBackedByACollectionRegistryList
    Implementation of IMirrorRecoveryLogPersister backed by a list obtained from ICollectionRegistry.getList(String, Properties, Class).
    MirrorTagValues
    Class that wraps TagValues so that we can intercept the setValue method in order to keep MarketMirror indices up to date.
    OrderArchiveLog
    Default implementation of IOrderArchive based on IArchiveLog.
    RequestHistory
    Standard implementations of IRequestHistory.
    RequestHistoryEntry
    A request and its current status.
    SynchronizedFixMarketMirror  
    SynchronizedFixMarketMirrorWithOrderArchive  
    UniqueKeysForFIXMessage
    Responsible for the list of unique key tags we can look messages up by in Fix Market Mirror.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ReferenceNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when the market mirror can't find an object that is referenced by a message.
